summary: Growing up, Susan Miller survived countless foster homes and years of abuse and neglect with one, burning goal: to someday find the birth mother who abandoned her - and get revenge.
cast: Andrea Roth|Lisa Dean Ryan|Jaimz Woolvett|Cindy Pickett|Gil Gerard|Gary Hudson|Lee Dawson|Bonita Friedericy|Matt Farnsworth|J.J. Boone|Cheryl Francis Harrington|Ray Rodriguez|Christopher Kriesa|Cherie Franklin|Peter Liapis|Shareen Roshan

title: La hijastra
